summary: The Department of Treasury manages the General Fund that finances daily and long-term government operations, including annual cash activity of more than $20 trillion. Treasury made significant progress in addressing the issues we identified in our audit of the FY 2018 Schedules of the General Fund, and resolved some of them. But remaining issues, which could take several years to resolve, continued to prevent us...
title: Financial Audit: Bureau of the Fiscal Service's FY 2020 Schedules of the General Fund
topics: Consolidated Financial Statements of the U.S. Government
